validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number

questions.question: Do you handle zari work and embroidered sarees?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in caring for delicate zari work and embroidered garments. Our team has extensive experience with ethnic wear and uses specialized cleaning techniques to preserve intricate details.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We currently serve Jodhpur and surrounding areas. Contact us to confirm if we service your location.

questions.question: How long does it take to get my clothes back?
questions.answer: Standard wash & fold service takes 24-48 hours. Dry cleaning typically takes 48-72 hours. Ironing services are completed within 24 hours. Turnaround time may vary based on service type and volume.

questions.question: Do you offer same-day service?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer same-day service for ironing and express wash & fold (subject to availability). Additional charges may apply. Please call us to check availability.

questions.question: What if my clothes are damaged?
questions.answer: All garments are insured during handling and cleaning. In the rare event of damage, we have a comprehensive insurance policy and will work with you to resolve the issue fairly.

questions.question: Do you use eco-friendly cleaning products?
questions.answer: Yes, we prioritize eco-friendly cleaning solutions that are safe for your family and the environment, while maintaining professional cleaning standards.

questions.question: Can I schedule a recurring pickup?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer subscription plans for regular customers. Contact us to set up a weekly or monthly schedule that works for you.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash on delivery, UPI, and digital payments. Payment is collected at the time of delivery.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: LaundryDone was founded with a simple mission: to provide premium, reliable laundry services that save you time while caring for your garments with the utmost attention. We combine traditional care values with modern convenience.
